12 killed in Road accident in Pratapgarh
sub_h: : At least 12 people, including four women and one kid, died and five others were injured when a speeding tanker hit and fell on an auto-rickshaw carrying 17 passengers near Sukhpal Nagar-Mohanganj road under Leelapur police station of Pratapgarh on Monday, police said.

sub_h: Four persons including three women were killed and three others sustained injures in Road accident when tractor trolley carrying them jumped into a dry canal and turned turtle near Ghoogha village under limits of Koraon police station on Saturday night.

h: 9 killed, 2 injured in Road accident in Uttar Pradesh’s Fatehpur district
sub_h: At least nine people were killed and two others sustained critical injuries after a tempo carrying them was hit by a speeding milk truck container in Uttar Pradesh’s Fatehpur district on Tuesday.

h: 2 cops dead, 4 army jawans injured in Road accident in Punjab's Fatehgarh Sahib
sub_h: Two policemen, who went to inspect a Road accident site in which four army jawans had suffered injuries, died on the spot after a speeding truck rammed into the bus involved in the mishap early on Wednesday on National Highway in Fatehgarh Sahib.

h: Four of a family die in a Road accident in UP's Pratapgarh
sub_h: The deceased were traveling on a bike when a high-speed car hit the bike and the entire family riding the bike died. The deceased have been identified as Manoj and Seema and their two kids and were residents of Mahabal of Sangipur police station of Pratapgarh.

h: 2 minors among 3 dead in Road accident

4 dead, 4 injured in head-on collision between two cars in Punjab's Sangrur
sub_h: Four persons died and four others were injured following a head-on collision between two cars in Punjab's Sangrur district on Wednesday morning. The police said that collision took place near a village at Sunam-Mansa road.

h: Two PAU students hurt in mishap
US-based Kabaddi player dies in Road accident near Machhiwara in Ludhiana
sub_h: 50-year-old Jasdev Singh Gola lived in Ohio.

h: Pedestrian, cyclist die in Road accidents
sub_h: Two men, including a pedestrian and a cyclist, died in two separate Road accidents in the city. In the first case, factory worker Satish Kumar, a 57-year-old resident of Guru Nanak Nagar, Lohara died after being hit by a speeding car while crossing a road near Giaspura.

h: One killed, 4 injured in tempo-bus collision
sub_h: A person was killed in a Road accident, and four others were injured. The driver of the private bus managed to escape, and the police are investigating.

h: Cop killed in accident on Pratapgarh-Amethi highway
sub_h: Inspector Amar Singh Raghuvanshi, 45, died after his car was allegedly hit by a speeding truck on Pratapgarhamethi Highway near Kalyanpur Road on Saturday morning. The incident took place under the limits of Antoo Police Station of Pratapgarh. According to police, the impact of the collision was such that both vehicles overturned and the inspector was trapped inside the car. It took over three hours to pull him out after cutting the car gate. Senior police officials rushed to the spot and sent the body for postmortem. The driver of the truck managed to escape.

h: Killer roads: Ludhiana’s accident death rate saw 28% rise in 2021
sub_h: A recent report from the state government has revealed that Ludhiana's road safety rate is the worst in the past three years. This has raised serious concerns over road safety in the district. At 160 health burden due to accidents recorded an increase of 28 in 2021 as compared to 2020 when the rate stood at 125 according to Punjab s and Traffic Report 2021.

h: Sugar mill senior official dies in Road accident in Ludhiana's Samrala
sub_h: Police officials identified the deceased as Amrinderpal Singh Dilawari of Mohali, who worked as chief engineer of a Sugar Mill in Budhewal village near Kohara of Ludhiana.

h: Out to reach school, teacher dies in accident
sub_h: A 40-year-old government school teacher died in a Road accident near Khanpur village of Dehlon area when an unidentified vehicle hit her scooter at around 7:30am on Tuesday. Police said that the accident could have been caused by poor visibility due to fog.

h: Student killed, cousin injured in accident
sub_h: A 22-year-old college student died while her cousin suffered minor injuries in a Road accident that took place near Dehlon Chowk at around 8AM on Tuesday. Police said that the duo had stopped at Dehlon Chowk when a speeding container hit them and escaped.

h: Six of family killed in Road accident
sub_h: Six persons of a family — four women and two kids — were killed and four others sustained injuries when the SUV carrying them turned turtle after hitting an electric pole near Handia toll plaza road under the limits of Handia police station in trans-Ganga pocket of Prayagraj on Thursday

h: 1,249 cases of Road accidents reported in 11 months; cops to identify new black spots in Prayagraj
sub_h: As many as 532 people lost their lives and 807 others sustained injuries in 1,249 cases of Road accidents in Sangam city between January 1 and November 30, 2022, revealed police data.

h: 2 killed in Road accident in trans-Ganga
sub_h: Two persons, including a truck cleaner were killed in a road mishap near Khodaypur village under the limits of Utrav police station in trans-Ganga pocket late on Saturday night.

h: Three killed in Road accident near Amritsar
sub_h: At least three persons including a woman died in an accident while another woman sustained injuries and is admitted to a private hospital.

h: Punjab: 2 killed, 2 injured in Road accident in Ludhiana

sub_h: Five people were killed and five others were injured when their vehicle hit a pole and overturned on a highway in the Handia police station area of the district on Thursday morning.

h: Ludhiana: 3 killed, 4 injured in Road accident on Samrala bypass
sub_h: In a tragic accident, at least three members of a family died and four others sustained injuries after two cars collided head-on on the Samrala bypass last night.

h: Boy killed, sister hurt in Road accident
sub_h: In yet another Road accident, a minor boy was killed while his 14-year-old sister sustained serious injuries when their cycle was hit by a speeding roadways bus near Sahsoon bypass road on Prayagraj- Gorakhpur highway under the limits of Sarayinayat police station on Monday afternoon.

h: Uttar Pradesh: 6 dead as truck runs over people sleeping on roadside in Chitrakoot
sub_h: Six people died while two were critically injured when a speeding pickup truck ran over a group of people sleeping on the roadside outside their house in Roli Kallyanpur village of Chitrakoot district early Saturday morning.

h: Prayagraj: Wife killed, hubby hurt in Road accident
sub_h: A woman shiksha mitra was killed and her husband sustained grave injuries after the bike carrying them was hit by a speeding truck near Lala Bazar area under the limits of Manikpur police station of Pratapgarh district on Wednesday morning.

h: Prayagraj: Head constable killed, another hurt in Road accident
sub_h: A 46-year-old head constable, posted at Unchahar was killed and another biker sustained injuries when two bikes collided head on near Shivgarh area under the limits of Soraon police station in trans-Ganga on Sunday.

h: ‘Stray cattle make Jassian Road accident prone’
sub_h: The commuters, particularly two wheeler riders, are wary of driving at Jassian Road due to the presence of too many stray cattle. This road connects to national highway (Amritsar-Delhi) and are used by many during the day, as it saves a lot of time.

h: Four dead in Road accident in Uttar Pradesh village, 13 wounded
Punjab: Batala MLA Sherry Kalsi's PA, kin among three killed in Road accident
sub_h: Batala MLA Sherry Kalsi's personal assistant (PA), a cousin and a friend were killed in a Road accident while his brother and another friend sustained injuries after the car they were travelling in hit the divider following a sudden tyre burst in the wee hours of Sunday.

h: Three killed, four hurt in Road accident in Prayagraj
With 527 cases, Prayagraj tops chart of Road accidents in range
sub_h: As many as 671 people have died in 1,184 Road accidents between January 1 and June 15 this year in four districts of Prayagraj range.

h: Road accidents: Ludhiana among top 10 deadliest cities in India
sub_h: With foggy season making a comeback, an NCRB report presents a grim picture on road safety and callous driving in Ludhiana. According to the report, Ludhiana was among top 10 cities in the country with high fatality rate in s in 2020.

h: 3 of family killed in Road accident
Punjab: Four dead in Road accident in Tarn Taran district
sub_h: Four people died while three others sustained injuries in a collision between two cars near Kadgill village in Tarn Taran district on Sunday. Those who died in the gruesome accident were identified as Jasdeep Singh, Ranjit Singh Rana, Bachittar Singh and Gagandeep Singh.

h: Multiple collisions in Ludhiana district leave 1 dead, 4 injured
sub_h: A man was killed and four others injured in two Road accidents in the city on Sunday night.

h: Ludhiana: Jassiyan Road woman dies in truck-bike crash
sub_h: A 52-year-old woman was killed and her son had a narrow escape after a truck hit their motorcycle in Daresi around 8.30pm on Sunday.

h: 3 killed in separate Road accidents
Eight killed as truck topples on parked SUV in UP's Kaushambi
sub_h: At least eight persons, including six women, a child and a driver, were killed when a stone-laden truck fell on a parked SUV near Deviganj crossing under the limits of Kadadham police station of Kaushambi district in early Wednesday. Two girls inside the SUV managed to save their lives after jumping from it.

h: UP: Six children among 14 killed in accident on Prayagraj-Lucknow highway

Two dead, 8 injured in UP road crash
sub_h: Two people were killed and eight others seriously injured on Friday when the tempo in which they were travelling overturned after being hit by a truck in Uttar Pradesh's Chitrakoot district, police said.

h: UP: Car collides with truck in Pratapgarh, 2 killed
sub_h: The incident occurred in Kharhar village in Raniganj area on Wednesday night when the victims were on way to Varanasi to attend a wedding, Circle officer, Raniganj, Atul Anjan Tripathi said.

h: CRPF jawan killed in Road accident
Uttar Pradesh: 1,200 killed in 2,200 Road accidents in Prayagraj range from Jan 1 to Nov 15
sub_h: Ironically, the Sangam city has once again topped the chart of Road accidents in terms of fatal and non-fatal category accidents. Prayagraj recorded a total of 993 cases of road mishaps between January 1 and November 15, followed by Fatehpur 536, Pratapgarh 416 and Kaushambi 313.

h: Punjab farmer dies of cardiac arrest, another in Road accident
sub_h: Two more farmers from Malwa region died during the ongoing protest on Monday. While Sukhdev Singh (63) of Gurm village in Barnala district died of cardiac arrest outside the residence of BJP district unit president Yadwinder Singh Shunty, Malkit Kaur (70) of Mansa died in a in Fatehabad while returning from the farmers’ protest at Delhi border.

h: One farmer dies of cardiac arrest, another in Road accident
sub_h: Two more farmers participating in the protest died early on Thursday. One of them suffered cardiac arrest while the other was killed in a Road accident. Jai Singh (37), a farmer of Tungwali village of Bathinda died of cardiac arrest at Tikri border. Singh, who had little over two acres of land, reached the Delhi border five days ago to participate in the protest.

h: Cop among five killed in road mishap in UP's Pratapgarh
sub_h: At least five persons including a constable were killed after the SUV carrying them rammed into a tree near Pipri Khalsa turn under Kandhai police station of Pratapgarh district late on Sunday night. A senior police official said that the incident took place at 11pm when members of a family were returning to Khajurani after attending a marriage ceremony at Kundanpur village.

h: ‘184 lives lost in 365 Road accidents since this January’
sub_h: Road accidents killed 184 commuters and left 216 injured in the four districts comprising Allahabad range between January 1 and February 20 this year, shows police data.

h: Punjab: Two band members, five injured in Road accident in Ludhiana

Road accidents: Prayagraj way ahead of other districts in range
Road accidents claimed more lives in June-July than in lockdown months in UP's Prayagraj
sub_h: A higher number of Road accidents of fatal and non-fatal category were recorded between June and July — when curbs were eased on services as part of Unlock 1.0 and 2.0 — as compared to the lockdown months of April and May in Prayagraj range. Prayagraj, Pratapgrah, Fatehpur and Kaushambi are the four districts which comprise Prayagraj range.

sub_h: Two persons lost their lives while three women were seriously injured in a Road accident after two cars collided at Patiala-Chandigarh road. The accident took place near Kauli village of Patiala district on Sunday afternoon between an Alto car and a Swift desire.

h: UP: Two killed, one injured in Road accident in UP's Kaushambi district
sub_h: Two people were killed and another seriously injured after their motorcycle was hit by a vehicle here, police said on Monday.

sub_h: The video of the Gokul Road accident, in which a six-year-old Harshit Kaushal, Gulchaman Gali died, has gone viral.

h: Man killed as truck hits scooter
sub_h: A 45-year-old man was killed when a truck hit a scooter on Gill Road on Thursday night. The victim’s friend had a lucky escape. The duo was not wearing helmets, cops said.

h: Four die in a Road accident in Bathinda
sub_h: Four boys in their early twenties died when the motorbike collided with a private transport bus on Muktsar-Kotkapura road on Wednesday.

h: 533 lost lives, 844 injured in 1267 cases of Road accidents in 11 months
sub_h: As many as 533 people lost their lives and 844 others were injured in a total of 1267 cases of Road accidents in the city between January 1 and November 30 this year.

h: Allahabad: 533 lost lives, 844 injured in 1267 cases of Road accidents in 11 months

sub_h: Eight persons, including four schoolchildren, were injured when the bus they were returning in from Vaishno Devi to Panipat met with an accident near Bija town, 30km from here, on Wednesday morning.
